task.prompt: Cary is saving money to buy a new pair of shoes that cost $120. He has already saved $30. He earns $5 for every lawn he mows. If he mows 3 lawns each weekend, how many more weekends will he have to mow lawns before he can afford to buy the shoes?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Cary is saving money to buy a new pair of shoes that cost $120. He has already saved $30. He earns $5 for every lawn he mows. If he mows 3 lawns each weekend, how many more weekends will he have to mow lawns before he can afford to buy the shoes?
